title: Vincent Tesoriero Appointed Chief Financial Officer at PLM Fleet | User | malvern-online.com
text:
PLM Fleet, the nation’s largest technology-driven refrigerated trailer fleet management company, is pleased to appoint Vincent Tesoriero to its Leadership team as Chief Financial Officer. Vincent has over 20 years of experience in Accounting and Finance with a specialization in Financial Services and Equipment Finance.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20250807235512/en/
Vincent Tesoriero Appointed Chief Financial Officer at PLM Fleet
"We are excited to welcome Vincent to PLM Fleet. With his background and experience in building and leading high-performance teams in financial services and equipment leasing to accelerate growth and customer impact, he will be invaluable as we chart innovative paths forward in fleet management," said Keith Shipp, President and CEO of PLM Fleet.
Vincent brings to PLM Fleet a wealth of experience in Financial Leadership, Strategic Planning, and Operational Excellence. Throughout his career, Vincent has led strategic initiatives in Financial and Accounting operations, completed complex corporate transactions, optimized capital structures, scaled organizations through periods of significant growth, and successfully navigated through challenging economic cycles. He has held Senior Finance leadership positions across several companies, consistently driving financial efficiency and supporting strategic business transformations. Vincent’s extensive experience in equipment finance, coupled with a strong leadership style, positions him well to help drive PLM Fleet’s continued expansion. Vincent has held key financial management positions at Xome/Mr. Cooper Group, Marlin Business Services Corp, American International Group, and Deloitte.
Vincent commented, “It is an honor to join PLM Fleet at such an exciting time in its journey. PLM Fleet’s strong market position, innovative culture, and highly talented team are truly impressive. I look forward to partnering with the Leadership team to build on this strong foundation and help accelerate the Company’s growth and long-term success.”
PLM Fleet is known for innovating refrigerated fleet management solutions to save customers time and money through leasing, renting and managing refrigerated trailers and assets used in the cold supply chain . More information can be found at plmfleet.com .
About PLM Fleet, LLC
PLM Fleet ® is the largest nationwide, technology-driven company dedicated to refrigerated trailer leasing, renting and cold supply chain solutions. Located in the state-of-the-art fleet solutions center in Newark, NJ, PLM Fleet has 35 locations nationwide and over 15,000 refrigerated trailers. Visit plmfleet.com to review all the financing, technology and services that help our customers improve fleet lifecycle efficiencies and cost savings in the cold supply chain.
View source version on businesswire.com: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20250807235512/en/
"With Vincent's experience in building and leading high-performance teams in financial services and equipment leasing, he will be invaluable as we chart innovative paths forward in fleet management," said Keith Shipp, President and CEO of PLM Fleet.
